attributes.action: Provide a 'Trading' or 'ID' card for self employed sole traders
attributes.additional_details: I would like a 'Trade Identity' card to be provided to each self employed sole trader, to enable them to prove they are correctly regsitered. With the increase in popularity of handmade and craft products, many people are selling to the public without registering as self employed, putting those who are registered and do pay their taxes at a disadvantage. This card would also allow members of the public to check that any trader they use to undertake 'oddjobs' or work on the home is trading legally too.
